Question: uniuni Corp. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
UniUni Corp.

Product: Savvy Toilet

- AI-based intelligent integrated solution for restroom safety
- Enables 24/7 real-time detection and action based on AI
- Identifies and analyzes abnormal behavior using deep learning with a 99.6% identification rate within 4 seconds
- Features real-time data collection, accurate data provision via an automated system, object detection mapping, location information provision, and real-time monitoring of customer behavior information
- Technology improves the accuracy of abnormal behavior detection by applying optimized AI models
- Engaged in joint business expansion with mobile telecommunication operators for network setup and business expansion
- Installed restroom safety solutions in over 30 locations nationwide and recorded sales of over 100 units
- Aiming to dominate the non-identifiable data AI market and secure the top position in the field
Summary_cn:
UniUni Corp.

产品：Savvy Toilet

- 基于人工智能的智能集成卫生间安全解决方案
- 实时检测和基于人工智能采取行动的24/7功能
- 利用深度学习识别和分析异常行为，在4秒内达到99.6%的识别率
- 具备实时数据采集、通过自动化系统提供准确数据、物体检测映射、位置信息提供以及实时监控客户行为信息的功能
- 通过应用优化的人工智能模型，提高异常行为检测的准确性
- 与移动电信运营商合作扩展业务网络的联合业务拓展
- 在全国范围内已安装卫生间安全解决方案30多个地点，并实现超过100台销售
- 旨在主导不可识别数据人工智能市场，并在该领域占据领先地位
